description.plain:
BLACKPINK (stylized BLΛƆKPIИK) (블랙핑크) is a South Korean girl group under YG Entertainment. The members are Jisoo, Jennie, Rosé, and Lisa. They have a versatile sound, ranging from YG’s signature hardcore hip-hop to slower songs bordering on A-town trap. According to a June 2016 Soompi article:

The meaning of Black Pink aims to contradict the common perception of the color pink. Pink is commonly used to portray prettiness, but Black Pink actually means to say that ‘Pretty isn’t everything.’ It also symbolizes that they are a team that encompasses not only beauty, but also great talent.

BLACKPINK officially debuted on August 8, 2016, releasing a two-track project titled Square One, featuring “BOOMBAYAH” and “Whistle.” The singles charted at #1 and #2 on Billboard’s World Digital Songs chart; and BLACKPINK are by far the fastest act to do so. On November 1, 2016, following the success of Square One, they released their second project, Square Two, which included “Playing with Fire” and “Stay.” On June 22, 2017, the group released their first standalone single, “AS IF IT’S YOUR LAST,” which debuted at #1 on Billboard’s World Digital Song Sales chart a day after its release. The music video amassed the most first-day views of any K-pop video at the time.

A year later, BLACKPINK returned with “DDU-DU DDU-DU,” the lead single of their four-track EP, SQUARE UP. The project performed well on the international charts and BLACKPINK broke another YouTube record with their music video for “DDU-DU DDU-DU”—becoming the most-viewed online video in the first 24 hours by a Korean artist. In October 2018, the group released a collaboration with British singer-songwriter Dua Lipa, titled “Kiss And Make Up.” A month later, BLACKPINK started their first world tour and held concerts in 18 countries across Asia, North America, Europe, and Oceania. In December, they debuted their first Japanese compilation album, Blackpink in Your Area containing every song they’d released at the time.

The following year, BLACKPINK released their second EP, Kill This Love. They also performed at the 2019 Coachella Festival on April 12 and April 19, becoming the first K-pop girl group to do so. On October 16, they put out the Japanese version of Kill This Love. In May 2020, BLACKPINK was featured on Lady Gaga’s “Sour Candy.” In the following months, the group released the singles “How You Like That” and “Ice Cream,” with Selena Gomez. Both are set to appear on BLACKPINK’s first full-length record. Following THE ALBUM, the girl group released a live album from their virtual concert THE SHOW and Japanese versions of the Korean songs in the record.

On July 22, 2022, BLACKPINK had an online concert collaboration with PUBG MOBILE called THE VIRTUAL, where you could listen to the first half of their song “Ready For Love,” which was originally teased in their documentary. A week later, the full version of “Ready For Love” was released exclusively on YouTube.

On August 19, 2022, BLACKPINK put out their pre-release single “Pink Venom,” which is part of their sophomore album BORN PINK. With the album’s tracklist release, “Ready For Love” is also included. The title track for this comeback is called “Shut Down.”

songs.full_title: 마지막처럼 (AS IF IT'S YOUR LAST) by BLACKPINK
songs.title: 마지막처럼 (AS IF IT’S YOUR LAST)

description.plain:
BLACKPINK released “As If It’s Your Last” as a surprise gift for their fans intended to refresh them during the summer heat. A sort of prequel to the third edition of their ‘SQUARE’ series, this track was BLACKPINK’s first song to be released as a single title track rather than part of a double.

The song is centered around a heavy synth and bass line, with a variety of drum rhythms keeping the beat. In the classic YG Entertainment style, hip-hop and mood-building verses work together to build up to a catchy hook. Differing slightly from their previous releases, BLACKPINK shows a more free and upbeat side to themselves with this track.

The lyrics, of course, talk about love: a ride-or-die type of love, encouraging the listener to give their all as it if was the only love of their life. The choreography centers around the infamous finger heart so commonly shown by K-Idols, as if BLACKPINK offers their love to their audience.

BLACKPINK teased this song through a variety of means, including multiple teaser photos, an MV teaser, and a behind-the-scenes preview, although the hairstyle changes on each member prior to the news of a comeback built the hype enough to begin with. They also aired a live broadcast on Naver’s V-Live around 2 hours after dropping the track and music video.

songs.embed_content: Read “마지막처럼 (AS IF IT'S YOUR LAST)” by BLACKPINK on Genius

104 ContributorsTranslationsEspañolРусскийItalianoFrançaisEnglishRomanization마지막처럼 (AS IF IT’S YOUR LAST) Lyrics[블랙핑크 "마지막처럼" 가사]

[Intro: Jennie]
(Little bit of that)
(Little bit of this)
(Little bit of that)
(Gimme, gimme, gimme)

[Verse 1: Jennie, Jisoo, Both]
(Gimme little bit of that) 너 뭔데 자꾸 생각나
(Gimme little bit of this) 자존심 상해 애가 타
얼굴이 뜨겁고 가슴은 계속 뛰어
내 몸이 맘대로 안 돼 어지러워
(Gimme little bit of that) 넌 한 줌의 모래 같아
(Gimme little bit of this) 잡힐 듯 잡히지 않아
넌 쉽지 않은 걸 그래서 더 끌려
내 맘이 맘대로 안 돼 어이없어
[Pre-Chorus: Rosé]
지금 너를 원하는 내
숨결이 느껴지니
널 바라보고 있어도 missing you
서툰 날 won't you set me free-e-e-e?

[Chorus: Jennie, Rosé, Lisa]
Baby, 날 터질 것처럼 안아줘
그만 생각해 뭐가 그리 어려워
거짓말처럼 키스해줘 내가 너에게
마지막 사랑인 것처럼
마지막처럼 (Yeah) 마-마-마지막처럼 (Yeah)
마지막 밤인 것처럼 love
마지막처럼 (Yeah) 마-마-마지막처럼 (Yeah)
내일 따윈 없는 것처럼 love
[Verse 2: Lisa]
Uh, I'ma fall in love, baby
You gon' finna catch me, uh
Give you all of this, baby
Call me pretty and nasty
'Cause we gonna get it, my love
You can bet it on black
We gon' double the stack on them, woo
I be the Bonnie and you be my Clyde
We ride or die, Xs and Os
You might also like[Pre-Chorus: Jisoo]
시간은 흘러가는데
마음만 급해지지
내 세상은 너 하나만 missing you
서툰 날 won't you set me free-e-e-e?

[Chorus: Rosé, Jennie, Lisa]
Baby, 날 터질 것처럼 안아줘
그만 생각해 뭐가 그리 어려워
거짓말처럼 키스해줘 내가 너에게
마지막 사랑인 것처럼
마지막처럼 (Yeah) 마-마-마지막처럼 (Yeah)
마지막 밤인 것처럼 love
마지막처럼 (Yeah) 마-마-마지막처럼 (Yeah)
내일 따윈 없는 것처럼 love

[Bridge: Jennie, Rosé, Lisa]
One, two, three, 새로운 시작이야
절대 뒤돌아보진 않을 거니까
날 너에게 던지면 너는 날 꼭 잡아줘
세상은 우릴 꺾지 못할 테니까
BLACKPINK in your area
(BLACKPINK in your—)

[Chorus: Jennie, Rosé, Lisa]
Baby, 날 터질 것처럼 안아줘
그만 생각해 뭐가 그리 어려워
거짓말처럼 키스해줘 내가 너에게
마지막 사랑인 것처럼
마지막처럼 (Yeah) 마-마-마지막처럼 (Yeah)
마지막 밤인 것처럼 love
마지막처럼 (Yeah) 마-마-마지막처럼 (Yeah)
내일 따윈 없는 것처럼 love85Embed

songs.full_title: Lovesick Girls by BLACKPINK
songs.title: Lovesick Girls

description.plain:
“Lovesick Girls” is about yearning for love, in spite of being fully aware that the pursuit could end in heartbreak.

On September 28, 2020, “Lovesick Girls” was officially confirmed as the leading track off BLACKPINK’s first full-length Korean record THE ALBUM. Many fans had concluded that a week prior to the announcement after they found the file name to the first album teaser was “LSG_teaser.jpg” on the girl group’s official website.

On September 27, 2020, BLACKPINK released THE ALBUM concept videos with a snippet of “Lovesick Girls”, which could be recognized by Shazam, a song identifier app.

On September 28, 2020, “Lovesick Girls” was officially confirmed as the leading track off BLACKPINK’s first full-length Korean record THE ALBUM. Many fans had concluded that a week prior to the announcement after they found the file name to the first album teaser was “LSG_teaser.jpg” on the girl group’s official website.

On September 27, 2020, BLACKPINK released THE ALBUM concept videos with a snippet of “Lovesick Girls”, which could be recognized by Shazam, a song identifier app.

songs.lyrics:
110 ContributorsTranslations中文Türkçeไทย / Phasa ThaiEspañolРусскийPortuguêsItalianoFrançaisTagalog / ᜆᜄᜎᜓᜄ᜔EnglishRomanizationLovesick Girls Lyrics[블랙핑크 "Lovesick Girls" 가사]

[Intro: All]
(Lovesick girls)
(Lovesick girls)

[Verse 1: Jennie, All]
영원한 밤
창문 없는 방에 우릴 가둔 love (Love)
What can we say?
매번 아파도 외치는 love (Love)
[Verse 2: Lisa]
다치고 망가져도 나
뭘 믿고 버티는 거야
어차피 떠나면 상처투성인
채로 미워하게 될걸
끝장을 보기 전 끝낼 순 없어
이 아픔을 기다린 것처럼

[Pre-Chorus: Jisoo, Rosé]
아마 다 잠깐 일지도 몰라
우린 무얼 찾아서 헤매는 걸까
But I don't care, I'll do it over and over
내 세상 속엔 너만 있으면 돼

[Chorus: All]
We are the lovesick girls
네 멋대로 내 사랑을 끝낼순 없어
We are the lovesick girls
이 아픔 없인 난 아무 의미가 없어

[Post-Chorus: Jennie & Rosé]
But we were born to be alone
Yeah, we were born to be alone
Yeah, we were born to be alone
But why we still looking for love?
You might also like[Verse 3: Lisa, Jennie]
No love letters, no X and O's
No love, never, my exes know
No diamond rings, that set in stone
To the left, better left alone
Didn't wanna be a princess, I'm priceless
A prince not even on my list
Love is a drug that I quit
No doctor could help when I'm lovesick

[Pre-Chorus: Rosé, Jisoo]
아마 다 잠깐 일지도 몰라
우린 무얼 찾아서 헤매는 걸까
불안한 내 눈빛 속에 널 담아
아프더라도 너만 있으면 돼

[Chorus: All]
We are the lovesick girls
네 멋대로 내 사랑을 끝낼 순 없어
We are the lovesick girls
이 아픔 없인 난 아무 의미가 없어

[Post-Chorus: Jennie & Rosé]
But we were born to be alone
Yeah, we were born to be alone
Yeah, we were born to be alone
But why we still looking for love?
[Bridge: Rosé, Jisoo]
사랑은 slippin' and fallin'
사랑은 killin' your darlin'
아프다 아물면 또 찾아오는 이 겁 없는 떨림
들리지 않아 what you say
이 아픔이 난 행복해
나를 불쌍해 하는 네가 내 눈엔 더 불쌍해

[Chorus: All]
We are the lovesick girls
네 멋대로 내 사랑을 끝낼 순 없어
We are the lovesick girls
이 아픔없인 난 아무 의미가 없어

[Interlude: Lisa]
One, two

[Outro: All, Rosé, Jennie]
(Lovesick girls) 모두 결국 떠나가고
(Lovesick girls) 내 눈물이 무뎌져도
(Lovesick girls) 아프고 또 아파도
(Lovesick girls)
But we're still looking for love68Embed

songs.full_title: 뚜두뚜두 (DDU-DU DDU-DU) by BLACKPINK
songs.title: 뚜두뚜두 (DDU-DU DDU-DU)

description.plain:
“뚜두뚜두 (DDU-DU DDU-DU)” is the trap-influenced title track from K-pop girl group BLACKPINK. The song was produced by YG Entertainment’s in-house producer Teddy Park, who has been behind many of K-Pop’s biggest hits, including BLACKPINK’s previous singles.

In “DDU-DU DDU-DU,” the girls are unapologetically savage. They’re not shy about letting you know about the success they’ve amassed.

A teaser of the MV was released on June 13 by YG Entertainment, followed by the release of the official MV two days later, on June 15 at 6PM KST.

This song is featured in the 2019 edition of the popular dance game, Just Dance, marking the game’s seventh Korean song of all time.

songs.embed_content: Read “뚜두뚜두 (DDU-DU DDU-DU)” by BLACKPINK on Genius

body.plain:
“뚜두뚜두 (DDU-DU DDU-DU)” is the trap-influenced title track from K-pop girl group BLACKPINK. The song was produced by YG Entertainment’s in-house producer Teddy Park, who has been behind many of K-Pop’s biggest hits, including BLACKPINK’s previous singles.

In “DDU-DU DDU-DU,” the girls are unapologetically savage. They’re not shy about letting you know about the success they’ve amassed.

A teaser of the MV was released on June 13 by YG Entertainment, followed by the release of the official MV two days later, on June 15 at 6PM KST.

This song is featured in the 2019 edition of the popular dance game, Just Dance, marking the game’s seventh Korean song of all time.

96 ContributorsTranslationsDanskРусский日本語DeutschFrançaisTagalog / ᜆᜄᜎᜓᜄ᜔EnglishRomanization中文뚜두뚜두 (DDU-DU DDU-DU) Lyrics[블랙핑크 "뚜두뚜두" 가사]

[Intro: All, Rosé]
BLACKPINK!
(Ah yeah, ah yeah!)
BLACKPINK!
(Ah yeah, ah yeah!)

[Verse 1: Jennie, Lisa, All]
Ayy, 착한 얼굴에 그렇지 못한 태도 (Huh)
가녀린 몸매 속 가려진 volume은 두 배로 (Yah, yah, double up)
거침없이 직진 굳이 보진 않지 눈치 (Woo!)
Black 하면 Pink 우린 예쁘장한 Savage (BLACKPINK!)
원할 땐 대놓고 뺏지 (Uh)
넌 뭘 해도 칼로 물 베기 (Uh)
두 손엔 가득한 fat check
궁금하면 해봐 fact check
눈 높인 꼭대기
물 만난 물고기
좀 독해 난 toxic
You 혹해 I'm foxy

두 번 생각해
흔한 남들처럼 착한 척은 못 하니까
착각하지 마
쉽게 웃어주는 건 날 위한 거야
아직은 잘 모르겠지
굳이 원하면 test me
넌 불 보듯이 뻔해
만만한 걸 원했다면
Oh, wait 'til I do what I do when I

Hit you with that ddu-du, ddu-du, du
(Ah yeah, ah yeah!)
Hit you with that ddu-du, ddu-du, du
(Ah yeah, ah yeah!)
Ddu-du, du-du-du-du-du

[Interlude: All]
(Hit you with that, hit you with that, hit you with that)
BLACKPINK!

지금 내가 걸어가는 거린
BLACKPINK four-way 사거리
동서남북 사방으로 run it

널 당기는 것도 멀리 밀치는 것도
제멋대로 하는 bad girl

When the bass drop, it's another banger
